title: 2021 Week 4 Recap - Brady Beats Belichick
itunes:title: 2021 Week 4 Recap - Brady Beats Belichick
description:
A room filled with some heroes and some virtual ones sprinkled in as well! We recap every game from week 4 starting with Tom Brady and Bill Belichick facing off in Gillette Stadium. The Rams lost at home to the Cardinals and Nick Shook joins to talk about the Browns. Kevin Patra comes atcha for a second week in a row.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
